projects.description:
I created an iOS app that streamlines workforce scheduling and management. Built with Swift, it uses Firebase for secure email authentication and a powerful database to keep everything organized.

Users can manage employees, assign work hours, schedule vacations, and generate PDF reports to share with contacts quickly and efficiently. This app boosts productivity and helps businesses stay in control of their team schedules with ease.
projects.title: Shift Manager
Market Basket Analisis
projects.description: Python Pandas is a powerful open-source data analysis and manipulation library that provides flexible data structures for working with structured data efficiently.
projects.code_snippet:
# Agrupar los productos por id_pedido con lambda
df_agrupado = df_cesta.groupby('id_pedido')['nombre_producto'].apply(lambda producto: ','.join(producto))
df_agrupado

'''
2da opcion de agrupar los productor por id_pedido

Paso 1: definir la funci贸n que une productos con coma

def unir_productos(producto):
    return ','.join(producto)

Paso 2: agrupar y aplicar esa funci贸n
df_agrupado = df_cesta.groupby('id_pedido')['nombre_producto'].apply(unir_productos)

Mostrar resultado
df_agrupado

'''
